Summary: several large bright (orange-red) starlike objects moving slowly
divs: Sighting DetailsObserved several orange-red starlike objects in the western sky. Approximately 7+ objects moving slowly in a southern direction (almost stationary). Apprximately 5 in a straight line and others were lower in the skyline. These lights appeeared to shift colors slightly from a reddish to orange tint ( very bright in the night sky). No sound observed, and objects began to fade out from the position they were in and vanished completely. The event occurred at 0015hrs on 12JAN01, no further sightings observed the rest of the morning.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Haverhill
There were no other sightings in Haverhill on or around January 1st 2012
